name: The Hunt in the Forest
description:
Hunt down all kinds of different animals in various environments.

Sometimes animals can attack you back, this is why you must to be attentive all the time! Develop a steady hand, line up your sights, and master the skills to take the perfect shot.

Game Features :
- Multiple optimized assault guns and snipers.
- Immersive & Unique shooter challenge series.
- 5 maps with different animals
- Hardcore action killing adventure
